ActionAlterCkUser.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdwch.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ActionAlterCkUser
<公共请求参数>

{
    "UserInfo": {
        "InstanceId": "cdwch-1vud9x9x",
        "UserName": "admin",
        "PassWord": "base54加密",
        "Describe": "测试用户"
    },
    "ApiType": "AddSystemUser"
}
ActionAlterCkUser.title: 新增、修改ck集群用户

CreateBackUpSchedule.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdwch.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateBackUpSchedule
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ScheduleId": 0,
    "WeekDays": "xx",
    "BackUpTables": [
        {
            "Table": "xx",
            "VCluster": "xx",
            "TotalBytes": 0,
            "Database": "xx"
        }
    ],
    "ExecuteHour": 0
}
CreateBackUpSchedule.title: 示例
